description: This file defines an API interface for the frontend, providing mock implementations of data retrieval functions used within the application. It acts as a facade to abstract away the data source, allowing seamless switching between mocks and real backend APIs.

methods.name: getSelectedAnimal
methods.description: Returns mock data for the selected animal.

methods.name: getBehaviorCounts
methods.description: Returns mock data for behavior counts.

methods.name: getDurationBreakdown
methods.description: Returns mock data for duration breakdown.

methods.name: getDailyHeatmap
methods.description: Returns mock data for daily heatmap.

methods.name: getBehaviorTypes
methods.description: Returns mock data for behavior types.
